name: Golf World
description:
Choose up to four players. Select different colors for your golf ball.

Version 1.0 comes with four 18 hole courses:

- Beginner: casual with sand hazards.

- Pro: challenging with water hazards.

- Master: challenging with creative holes.

- Moon: golf in space, orbits and black holes.

- Forest: mushrooms, trees, buttons and doors.

While you're playing the game, your "points" are the total par minus your total strokes.
